ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] attention listowner
ygData.msgSnippet: omg i agree.  i joined just a few dayz ago to meet other girls to play eq (we all know how much of a lifestyle it is...) and instead it s the usually guy crap!
ygData.messageBody:
omg i agree. i joined just a few dayz ago to meet other girls to play eq
(we all know how much of a lifestyle it is...) and instead it's the usually
guy crap!
______________________________________________________________________________

okay, i recently quit a guild that had several prepubecent members... I
know for sure we had an 8 year old girl (her parents owned a gaming store
and she had been involved in D&D her entire life) and a 12 year old boy.
That in itself was great! I was really proud of how well the young people
were doing on raids and such. Also, that such young people would choose to
be anti-pk was a testiment to their character! (RALLOS ZEK GHETTO FAB!!!)
However, as I'm sure you've all noticed, sometimes guild chat can get rather
..... 18 and over... On one particular occasion, the 12 year old young man
mentioned above was trying to relate to the others his own sexual experience
to seem more a part of the group. He wasnt impressing anyone apparently,
and the older guys were making fun of him and calling him a liar. He
addmitted to having fabricated most of the story but insisted he had
"touched a boob"... Well the guys thought that was hillarious and proceeded
to lay into the boy verbally. I couldnt just sit there so I mentioned he
was only 12 and told them to let the boy have his childhood. Then I made
the observation that it was 10pm on a Saturday night, and they were all
spending it on the computer... Unbelieveably they started agreeing with me!
By the way they responded to that, I'm starting to wonder if ALL of that
guild isnt under the age of 16...... I quit the guild for other reasons (if
anyone has a nice guild 55+ on rallos, lemmie know... i'm guild shopping)
but that always bugged me. EQ is not the right place for your sexual
frustrations!!!

Angie aka Gizzi 55 necro (rallos zek)
